ong.description.toLowerCase().includes(filters.search.toLowerCase()); const matchesArea = !filters.area || ong.area === filters.area; const matchesState = !filters.state || ong.state === filters.state; return matchesSearch && matchesArea && matchesState; }); const handleFilterChange = (key, value) => { setFilters(prev => ({ ...prev, [key]: value })); }; const clearFilters = () => {
